function_call.name: get_risks
function_call.arguments: {"risks":[{"Description":"Inadequate HVAC filter efficiency and capacity","Impact":"Increased exposure to airborne viruses and contaminants","Mitigation":"Use filters with MERV 13 rating or higher, ensure proper sizing and capacity, consult HVAC suppliers","Technologies":"HEPA filters, Ultra-Low Particulate Air filter, Portable room HEPA filter units","People":"Building occupants, residents, employees, students","Owner":"HVAC/furnace suppliers, installation companies, building owners"},{"Description":"Improper filter use in older home furnaces","Impact":"Ineffective filtration of viruses and contaminants","Mitigation":"Ensure compatibility of efficient filters with older systems, consult HVAC/furnace suppliers","Technologies":"Properly sized and compatible filters","People":"Residents, homeowners","Owner":"HVAC/furnace suppliers, installation companies, homeowners"}]}
